mapper.insert: insert into board_notice (userid, subject, content, hit, regitime) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now());
mapper.select:
select articleno, userid, subject, content, hit, case when date_format(regitime, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(regitime, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(regitime, '%y.%m.%d') end regitime from board_notice
where subject like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
where content like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
order by articleno desc
